sentences.en: A really good catalogue can also whet customers' appetites for merchandise.
sentences.cn: 一份真正好的商品目录也可以激起顾客购买的欲望。

sentences.en: Help the boy to look up the book in the catalogue.
sentences.cn: 请帮助这孩子在目录里找找这本书.

sentences.en: His story is a catalogue of misfortune.
sentences.cn: 他的经历充满着接二连三的不幸。

sentences.en: I saw some slacks I like in the Sears catalogue.
sentences.cn: 我在西尔斯商品目录看中了几条便裤.

sentences.en: If traipsing around shops does not appeal to you, perhaps using a catalogue will.
sentences.cn: 如果不愿逛商店逛得腰酸腿疼，也许您会愿意使用商品目录。

sentences.en: It is necessary to draw readers'attention to the catalogue.
sentences.cn: 必须提醒读者去注意目录.

sentences.en: Send for your free catalogue today.
sentences.cn: 今天寄信索要你们的免费目录。

sentences.en: The catalogue is full of testimonials from satisfied customers.
sentences.cn: 这份商品目录满篇皆是称心顾客的赞辞。

sentences.en: The catalogue records describes and indexes the resources of a library.
sentences.cn: 目录将图书馆资料加以记载、描述并编入索引.

sentences.en: The company reissued its catalogue with a new price list.
sentences.cn: 这个公司重新发行了带有新价格表的商品目录.

sentences.en: The librarian entered a new book in the catalogue.
sentences.cn: 图书管理员把一本新书编入目录.

sentences.en: The manuscripts have never been systematically catalogued.
sentences.cn: 一直没有系统地为这些手稿编过目录。

sentences.en: The principal finding aid they offer users -- the card catalogue -- is largely ineffectual.
sentences.cn: 他们提供给读者的主要查找途径 -- 卡片目录 -- 大部分已经失效.

sentences.en: Their full catalogue costs $5, redeemable against a first order.
sentences.cn: 他们的完整目录售价5美元，第一次订购时可返还这5美元。

sentences.en: You could even order windows from a catalogue — a sort of mail order stained glass service.
sentences.cn: 你甚至可以根据目录订购窗户——可以说是一种邮购彩色玻璃的业务。

words.tran_cn: 把…编目分类（catalogue的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_en: a complete list of things that you can look at, buy, or use, for example in a library or at an art show
a complete list of things that you can look at, buy, or use, for example in a library or at an art show

trans.tran_cn: 列入目录，列举，美式拼写 catalog
trans.tran_en: to make a complete list of all the things in a group
to make a complete list of all the things in a group
